attributes.action: Make the funding formula fair across the UK and GB
attributes.background: The Scottish Government's funding per person is almost 30 per cent higher than the English equivalent. As a result, although Scotland’s total budget this year will be two per cent lower per person than it was in 2010-11 this is a smaller fall than that seen in England over the same period.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like the block grant to Scotland and the other devolved nations to be reduced, or if you'd like to see increased Government spending in England on specific things. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
